/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Trees dot the scene, adding a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
